short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage and copy AI prompts with ease

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI Prompt Maestro is the ultimate tool for AI enthusiasts, writers, and developers who frequently use AI platforms. This powerful extension helps you effortlessly manage, organize, and access your AI prompts across various categories.
Key Features:

Categorize prompts (Writing, Coding, Creative, and more)
Quick search functionality to find the right prompt instantly
Export and import your prompt collection for easy backup and transfer
Edit prompts on the fly with character count display
Copy prompts to clipboard with a single click
